pkgmetadata.longdescription: Select and Download Climate Data from 'DWD' (German Weather Service) // Handle climate data from the 'DWD' ('Deutscher Wetterdienst', see https://www.dwd.de/EN/climate_environment/cdc/cdc.html for more information). Choose observational time series from meteorological stations with 'selectDWD()'. Find raster data from radar and interpolation according to https://bookdown.org/brry/rdwd/raster-data.html. Download (multiple) data sets with progress bars and no re-downloads through 'dataDWD()'. Read both tabular observational data and binary gridded datasets with 'readDWD()'.
